means two sets of s- and p-orbitals plus one set of d-orbitals on silicon atoms, and two sets of s-orbitals
plus a set of p-orbitals on hydrogen atoms. The electron density and potential terms were calculated on
a real space grid with the spacing equivalent to a plane-wave cut-off of 200 Ry. The calculations were
